TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit JumpTask extends System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem

summary.span: 表示在 Windows 7 工作列跳躍清單中的應用程式捷徑。

span.span: Represents a shortcut to an application in the Windows 7 taskbar Jump List.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可視為應用程式的捷徑。A can be thought of as a shortcut to an application. 您指定可執行檔的路徑，藉由設定屬性。You specify the path to the executable file by setting the property. 如果未設定，就會隱含目前正在執行的處理序的路徑。If the is not set, the path of the current running process is implied. 您可以選擇性地指定傳遞至在啟動應用程式。You can optionally specify to pass to the application at startup. 您可以設定基本的顯示屬性，例如， ，和跳躍清單中指定工作的外觀。You can set basic display properties, such as , , and to specify the appearance of the task in the Jump List. 搭配使用的圖示必須可以當做原生資源。An icon used with a must be available as a native resource. 如果多個圖示可用的資源 DLL 或可執行檔中，您會指定要使用藉由指示中的位移屬性。If multiple icon resources are available in a DLL or executable file, you specify the one to use by indicating an offset in the property. 根據預設，將放置於**工作**跳躍清單的類別。By default, a will be placed in the **Tasks** category of the Jump List. 您可以設定來指定工作的自訂群組屬性。You can specify custom grouping of tasks by setting the property. 您可以建立，以視覺化方式分隔跳躍清單中的項目沒有和指定。You can visually separate items in a Jump List by creating a that does not have a and specified. 這個空白將會顯示為水平線跳躍清單中。This empty will be displayed as a horizontal line in the Jump List. 在此情況下，可以設定其他屬性，但它們不會有任何影響。In this case, other properties can be set, but they will not have any effect. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何宣告標記中。The following example shows how to declare a in markup. 開啟文字檔，名為`readme.txt`「 記事本 」 應用程式中。The opens a text file named `readme.txt` in the Notepad application. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#002](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#002)] 下列範例示範如何設定程式碼中。The following example shows how to configure a in code. 會開啟 [小算盤] 應用程式。The opens the Calculator application. [!code-csharp[Shell_JumpListSample#241](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#241)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ApplicationPath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式的路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to the application.
The path to the application.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定屬性，則會隱含目前正在執行的處理序的路徑。If the property is not specified, then the path of the current running process is implied. 應用程式可以包含非其本身的可執行檔的工作。An application can contain tasks for executables other than itself. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何宣告標記中。The following example shows how to declare a in markup. 開啟文字檔，名為`readme.txt`「 記事本 」 應用程式中。The opens a text file named `readme.txt` in the Notepad application. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#002](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#002)] 下列範例示範如何設定程式碼中。The following example shows how to configure a in code. 會開啟 [小算盤] 應用程式。The opens the Calculator application. [!code-csharp[Shell_JumpListSample#241](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#241)]

summary.span: 取得或設定在啟動時傳遞給應用程式的引數。

span.span: Gets or sets the arguments passed to the application on startup.

value.span: 要在啟動時傳遞給應用程式的引數。

span.span: The arguments passed to the application on startup.
The default is .

span.span: Gets or sets the text displayed in the tooltip for the task in the Jump List.

value.span: 針對工作顯示於工具提示中的文字。

span.span: The text displayed in the tooltip for the task.
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int IconResourceIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定內嵌於資源中之圖示的索引 (以零為起始)。

span.span: Gets or sets the zero-based index of an icon embedded in a resource.

value.span: 圖示之以零起始的索引，如果沒有使用圖示，則為 -1。

span.span: The zero-based index of the icon, or -1 if no icon is used.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搭配使用的圖示必須可以當做原生資源。An icon used with a must be available as a native resource. 如果多個圖示可用 DLL 或可執行檔中，您會指定要使用藉由指示中的位移屬性。If multiple icons are available in a DLL or executable file, you specify the one to use by indicating an offset in the property. 如果未不指定任何圖示資源，或如果找不到指定的圖示時，會顯示標準的系統 圖示。If no icon resource is specified, or if the specified icon is not found, the standard system icon is displayed. 若要指定無圖示會顯示，請設定屬性設為-1。To specify that no icon is displayed, set the property to -1. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何宣告標記中。The following example shows how to declare a in markup. 開啟文字檔，名為`readme.txt`「 記事本 」 應用程式中。The opens a text file named `readme.txt` in the Notepad application. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#002](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#002)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ IconResourcePath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定資源的路徑，這個資源包含要顯示於跳躍清單中的圖示。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to a resource that contains the icon to display in the Jump List.

value.span: 包含圖示之資源的路徑。

span.span: The path to a resource that contains the icon.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搭配使用的圖示必須可以當做原生資源。An icon used with a must be available as a native resource. 如果多個圖示可用 DLL 或可執行檔中，您會指定要使用藉由指示中的位移屬性。If multiple icons are available in a DLL or executable file, you specify the one to use by indicating an offset in the property. 如果未不指定任何圖示資源，或如果找不到指定的圖示時，會顯示標準的系統 圖示。If no icon resource is specified, or if the specified icon is not found, the standard system icon is displayed. 若要指定無圖示會顯示，請設定屬性設為-1。To specify that no icon is displayed, set the property to -1. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何宣告標記中。The following example shows how to declare a in markup. 開啟文字檔，名為`readme.txt`「 記事本 」 應用程式中。The opens a text file named `readme.txt` in the Notepad application. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#002](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#002)] 下列範例示範如何設定程式碼中。The following example shows how to configure a in code. 會開啟 [小算盤] 應用程式。The opens the Calculator application. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定針對跳躍清單中工作所顯示的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text displayed for the task in the Jump List.

value.span: 針對跳躍清單中工作所顯示的文字。

span.span: The text displayed for the task in the Jump List.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，屬性必須設定為才會出現在跳躍清單做為可點按的工作。Typically, the property must be set for the to appear in the Jump List as a clickable task. 或者，您可以視覺化方式分隔跳躍清單中的項目建立沒有和指定。Alternatively, you can visually separate items in a Jump List by creating a that does not have a and specified. 這個空白將會顯示為水平線跳躍清單中。This empty will be displayed as a horizontal line in the Jump List. 在此情況下，可以設定其他屬性，但它們不會有任何影響。In this case, other properties can be set, but they will not have any effect. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何宣告標記中。The following example shows how to declare a in markup. 開啟文字檔案名稱`readme.txt`「 記事本 」 應用程式中。The opens a text file name `readme.txt` in the Notepad application. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#002](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#002)] 下列範例示範如何設定程式碼中。The following example shows how to configure a in code. 會開啟 [小算盤] 應用程式。The opens the Calculator application. [!code-csharp[Shell_JumpListSample#241](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#241)]

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式在啟動時的工作目錄。

span.span: Gets or sets the working directory of the application on startup.

value.span: 應用程式在啟動時的工作目錄。

span.span: The working directory of the application on startup.
The default is .
